actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress with respect to the protection of the premises of diplomatic missions.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of Congress that the President should: (1) negotiate with foreign states for an agreement for mutual and reciprocal diplomatic security arrangements; and (2) obtain multilateral support for the establishment of a permanent diplomatic security corps under the auspices of the United Nations. Sets forth the function of such security corps.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress with respect to the protection of the premises of diplomatic missions.
